thread.title: GAME: Spongebob Squarepants came to Savannah, now help him with his glasses

author: Josh Rayburn
title: GAME: Spongebob Squarepants came to Savannah, now help him with his glasses
text:
SPECIAL OFFER FOR NEW READERS 99 cent digital subscription to savannahnow.com
Subscriber-members get access to ALL our digital products AND become eligible for free event tickets, discount coupons and other benefits. SIGN UP FOR SUBSCRIBER BENEFITS As a Savannah Morning News / savannahnow.com subscriber, you're eligible for members-only discounts. Download your coupons now. Related Stories Antonio Banderas to star in SpongeBob movie filming soon in Savannah, Tybee Businesses along Savannah's Broughton share mixed reactions following 'SpongeBob' Parts of Broughton Street being painted "coral" for upcoming Spongebob filming By Josh Rayburn If you’re like us and working on Columbus Day while others have the day off (or maybe stuck at home doing work there), take a little break on us.
To play, click on the video above once for it to start, then again to stop it when Spongebob is behind the glasses. Mess up? Start over and try again!
What’s our Columbus Day link to this game of matching glasses on SpongeBob Squarepants? Well, it’s a bit of a stretch, but just go with it:
· Christopher Columbus sailed the ocean blue in 1942 on a ship.
· A giant pirate ship sailing through downtown Savannah was a big part of the filming of “Spongebob Squarepants 2” when it filmed in Savannah.
· Play this Vine game above to glasses on Spongebob.
I warned you it was a stretch.
And let me know how you do on the game. I still can’t get it!
